statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM user_authentication;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_authentication WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM user_authentication ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_authentication;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'test_user';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT u.username, s.login_time FROM users u JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM user_sessions ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND activity = 'login' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as log_count FROM user_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, friend_id FROM user_friends WHERE user_id = 2 OR friend_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT u.username, uf.full_name FROM users u JOIN user_profiles uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id;
SELECT us.session_id, u.username, uf.full_name FROM user_sessions us JOIN users u ON us.user_id = u.user_id JOIN user_profiles uf ON u.user_id = uf.user_id;

SELECT * FROM profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, bio, location FROM profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT users.username, profiles.full_name FROM users JOIN profiles ON users.user_id = profiles.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 3;
SELECT password_hash FROM passwords WHERE user_id = 4;
